sentences.sContent: For me, Christmas always began in the middle of the cold, windy month of November.
sentences.sContent_eng: For me, Christmas always began in the middle of the cold, windy month of November.
sentences.sCn: 在我的记忆中，圣诞节总是从寒冷多风的十一月中旬就开始了。

sentences.sContent: Autumn will be king September , October and November .
sentences.sContent_eng: Autumn will be king September , October and November .
sentences.sCn: 秋天将会是九月，十月和十一月之王。

trans.tranOther: the 11th month of the year, between October and December
